places_with_reviews.name: S K MARRIAGE LAWN

reviews.text:
Good lawn.
I recently attended a wedding at S K marriage lawn and I must say it was a wonderful experience. The venue was stunning and the entire event was well-organized and executed.

The lawn itself was spacious and well-maintained, with lush greenery and beautiful flowers adorning the surroundings. The seating arrangements were comfortable and there was ample space for all the guests to move around freely.

The staff at S K marriage lawn were extremely helpful and courteous. They made sure that all the guests were comfortable and had everything they needed. The decorations were also top-notch, adding to the overall ambiance of the venue.

The food served at the wedding was delicious. From the starters to the main course and desserts, everything was prepared to perfection. The menu had a wide variety of dishes to choose from, catering to different tastes and preferences.

One thing that stood out for me was the attention to detail. The management at S K marriage lawn made sure that every aspect of the event was taken care of, leaving no room for any complaints. The sound system and lighting were also on point, creating a lively and festive atmosphere.

The parking facility at the venue was also convenient and well-organized. The staff guided the guests to their designated parking spots, making it hassle-free for everyone.

Overall, I had a great experience at S K marriage lawn and I highly recommend it for any wedding or event. The venue, the staff, the food, and the management exceeded my expectations and made the event truly special. I would definitely consider hosting my own event at S K marriage lawn in the future.

Worst marriage lawn of barabanki, manager of the lawn is a lyer and makes false promises, no water supply, ac's of rooms and banquet hall are not functional. Poor services , they usually don't have diesel for running generator.
Best wedding lawn in barabanki all mangement are very good 💯
Good place for marriage, location is little interior otherwise it is good

I was involved for one wedding at the venue. The decoration, the venue all are absolutely fantastic.
I really liked how there are two separate spaces so that different things can be arranged. The parking facility is a big plus.
However one thing that needs improvement is the rooms and the facilities in them. There was frequent shortage for water supply in the rooms and only two rooms had a mirror installed. So this caused pretty inconvenience for us. As a guest things were fine but as an organiser it was bad

places_with_reviews.name: Shivalik Residency - Hotel & Banquet Hall
address: Mayur Vihar, Obaree, Uttar Pradesh 225001, India

reviews.text: Wonderful service .. I m impressed with staff of Shivalik residency.. I am giving 5 star review .. And I can recommend Shivalik residency for providing me top class service. Shivalik residency is Best hotel in barabanki.. Few days ago I stayed here for 2 days and got wonderful experience

Instead of staying in ayodhya or lucknow, we stayed here as the rooms were not costly INR1400 per room per night. and even they allowed late checkout upon request. And for that cost, the rooms were good enough, neat with AC and geyser. Only thing was no lift, but the person available there to carry our luggage, so that was not an issue.
Good hotel to stay with family and children. . Whenever I come in barabanki,  I choose only Shivalik Residency.  Best hotel in barabanki. . Ac well neat and clean room.

It's very good  hotel/ marriage vanue rather multi purpose  accommodation. Well maintained and managed . Only one thing noticed, i.e. approach road from main road not paved / constructed . It may be that coloniser or municipality has not taken interest in it . Second point I don't find enough space for parking of vehicles.  Parking is done on both the sides of approach road. If both things are taken care of, it's one of the best hotel or multi purpose venue . It's worth to be hired or booked for any type of functions and accommodation.
Best hotel in barabanki. Good rooms. Clean rooms
